description: Manage your Cloudflare DNS records seamlessly through AI agents. List, create, update, and delete DNS records with full support for various record types and Cloudflare API features. Securely control your domain's DNS settings with scoped API tokens and easy integration.

cloudflareEmail.description: Your Cloudflare account email (only needed for legacy API keys)

cloudflareZoneId.description: The Zone ID of your domain in Cloudflare

cloudflareApiToken.description: Your Cloudflare API Token with Zone:Edit permissions

capabilities.name: list_dns_records
capabilities.description: List all DNS records for the configured zone

capabilities.name: get_dns_record
capabilities.description: Get a specific DNS record by ID
